lead_paragraph: Soccer's five-times World Player of the Year Lionel Messi said on Thursday he knew nothing about an alleged tax evasion scheme when he signed contracts related to image rights.

headline.print_headline: Lionel Messi Says He Knew Nothing About Tax Fraud
headline.main: Lionel Messi Says He Knew Nothing About Tax Fraud

snippet: Soccer's five-times World Player of the Year Lionel Messi said on Thursday he knew nothing about an alleged tax evasion scheme when he signed contracts related to image rights....
